attributes.action:
Construction industry need a change forever 
No renewal to cscs,cpcs
attributes.additional_details:
To save money government have to encourage people to work if they have the qualification why need to renew and pay for cscs and cpcs ??
Induction on sites is important but pay to renew tikets are just robbing workers and government should stop it now
Once you have a qualification I don't see why should be renew every 4 5 years people don't forget how to drive a plant or how to build a wall.
attributes.background:
Stop letting people without work because they need to renew tikets like cscs,cpcs they just pushing people away from having a job and earn money.
Thats way more and more people are not working in construction.

rejection.details: Decisions about whether and when construction professionals need to renew their licences is a matter for the professional bodies that provide these licences, not the Government or House of Commons.
